mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( item_no, item_img, item_name, item_content, origin_p, sales_p, stock_cnt, cate_no, dis_no ) VALUES ( product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{item_img}, #{item_name}, #{item_content}, #{origin_p}, #{sales_p}, #{stock_cnt}, #{cate_no}, 17 )
mapper.select: SELECT p.item_no, p.item_name, c.cate_name, p.origin_p, p.sales_p, p.item_img, p.item_content, p.stock_cnt, p.cate_no FROM product p LEFT JOIN cate c ON p.cate_no = c.cate_no
